Get the Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) categories and description for ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on diagnoses.

IcdDxToCCS.Rd

Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) for ICD-9 and ICD-10 diagnosis codes in clinical diagnostic data is a diagnosis categorization scheme.

IcdDxToCCS(DxDataFile, idColName, icdColName, dateColName, icd10usingDate,
  isCCSCategoryDescription = T)

Arguments

DxDataFile

A file of clinical diagnostic data with at least 3 columns: "MemberID", "ICD", and "Date"
idColName

A column for MemberID of DxDataFile
icdColName

A column for ICD of DxDataFile
dateColName

A column for Date of DxDataFile
icd10usingDate

ICD-10 using date
isCCSCategoryDescription

Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) single level categories/description for ICD-9 or ICD-10. By default it is set to True.

Source

ICD-9-CM CCS (2015)

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/ccs/Single_Level_CCS_2015.zip

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/ccs/Multi_Level_CCS_2015.zip

ICD-10-CM CCS (2019)

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/ccs10/ccs_dx_icd10cm_2019_1.zip

Details

return Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) categories or description based on ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes

Examples

head(sampleDxFile)
#>    ID    ICD       Date
#> 1:  C  553.3 2008-04-03
#> 2:  A  553.3 2008-05-01
#> 3:  A 553.20 2009-02-23
#> 4:  B 553.20 2007-08-29
#> 5:  A  553.3 2008-06-27
#> 6:  B  K44.9 2019-11-10
IcdDxToCCS(sampleDxFile, ID, ICD, Date, "2015-10-01", TRUE)
#> Wrong ICD format: total 1 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> 123.45 (1)
#> 	
#> Wrong ICD version: total 4 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("A01.05 (1)", "E03.0 (1)", "A0105 (1)", "42761 (1)")
#> 	
#> Warning: The ICD mentioned above matches to "NA" due to the format or other issues.
#> Warning: "Wrong format" means the ICD has wrong format
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD version" means the ICD classify to wrong ICD version (cause the "icd10usingDate" or other issues)
#> $groupedDf
#>       Short ID    ICD       Date           CCS_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION
#>   1:   5533  C  553.3 2008-04-03                   Abdominal hernia
#>   2:   5533  A  553.3 2008-05-01                   Abdominal hernia
#>   3:  55320  A 553.20 2009-02-23                   Abdominal hernia
#>   4:  55320  B 553.20 2007-08-29                   Abdominal hernia
#>   5:   5533  A  553.3 2008-06-27                   Abdominal hernia
#>  ---                                                               
#> 166:  E03.0  B  E03.0 2014-10-01                               <NA>
#> 167:   E030  A   E030 2014-10-01 External cause codes:  Unspecified
#> 168: A01.05  B A01.05 2014-10-01                               <NA>
#> 169:   E030  C   E030 2015-10-01                  Thyroid disorders
#> 170:  A0105  A  A0105 2014-10-01                               <NA>
#> 
#> $groupedData_Long
#>     ID                                    CCS_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION
#>  1:  C                                            Abdominal hernia
#>  2:  A                                            Abdominal hernia
#>  3:  B                                            Abdominal hernia

#> 19:  C       Other nutritional; endocrine; and metabolic disorders
#> 20:  A                          External cause codes:  Unspecified
#> 21:  C                                           Thyroid disorders

#>  5:    2009-06-09  2009-06-09     1    0 days
